name: Strapi
description: Strapi Heroku deployment with mongoddb & cloudinary upload plugin

DATABASE_URI.description: Add your connection string to MongodDB Atlas

CLOUDINARY_NAME.description: The 'Cloud name' of your Cloudinary account

CLOUDINARY_KEY.description: The 'API Key' of your Cloudinary account

CLOUDINARY_SECRET.description: The 'API Secret' of your Cloudinary account
